src.data.train.target

Helper functions for building target column for games data.

src.data.train.target.build_target(raw_games_path, train)[source]

Build target column for games data. Only keep rows with game_ids found in train.

Parameters:

  • raw_games_path – str Path to raw games data.

  • train – pd.DataFrame of shape (n_train, n_columns) Training data.

Returns:

pd.DataFrame of shape (n_train, 2) Target column.

src.data.train.target.make_target_col(games)[source]

Make target column for games data.

Parameters:

games – pd.DataFrame Games data.

Returns:

np.array Target column.
